original_title: Sri Lankans demand justice for the victims of the April 21st attacks
original_body_lines: Colombo (News 1st) – A candlelight vigil was held in front of the Victorian Parliament in East Melbourne, Australia on Saturday demanding justice for the victims of the April 21st attacks.
The vigil was organized by the Australia Sri Lanka Forum for April 21st attacks victims.
